title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2135/93 of 28 July 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3895/92 fixing the amount of the carry-over aid for certain fishery products for the 1993 fishing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2135/93 of 28 July 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3895/92 fixing the amount of the carry-over aid for certain fishery products for the 1993 fishing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The titles of sections 1 and 2 of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3895/92 are hereby amended as follows:
'1. Amount of the carry-over aid for products listed in Annex I (A) and (D) and for sole (Solea spp.) listed in Annex I (E) to Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92.'
'2. Amount of the carry-over aid for other products listed in Annex I (E) to Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92.'

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1993.
For the Commission
Yannis PALEOKRASSAS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 388, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 76, 30. 3. 1993, p. 12.
(3) OJ No L 392, 31. 12. 1992, p. 19.
